titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the James C. Miller papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Theresa Berger

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-09-15T16:02-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Rehoused material, revised partial inventory and added complete inventory (Theresa Berger).

did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, memoranda, notes, reports, studies, statistics, clippings, and other printed matter relating to domestic policy in the United States during the presidential administration of Ronald Reagan, and especially to policy regarding regulation of commerce, planning and implementation of the federal budget, and administration of federal government agencies.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], James C. Miller papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1989.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: James C. Miller III is an American economist, former US government official, and Hoover Institution senior fellow. He has held numerous government positions throughout his career, including chairman of the Federal Trade Commission (1981-1985) and director of the Office of Management and Budget (1985-1988). In 1981, Miller was administrator for the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs and executive director for Vice President George H.W. Bush's Presidential Task Force on Regulatory Relief. Between 1977 and 1981, he was a resident scholar at the Center for the Study of Government Regulation at the American Enterprise Institute, serving as co-director of the center from 1978 to 1981.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The James C. Miller papers consist primarily of speeches and transcripts relating to domestic policy in the United States during the presidential administration of Ronald Reagan. Writings, memoranda, correspondence, notes, reports, studies, photographs, and printed matter are also included. The collection spans the years 1971 through 1989, with the bulk of the material covering the period from 1981 to 1988. Subjects include regulation of commerce, planning and implementation of the federal budget, and administration of federal government agencies.

arrangement.head: Arrangement Statement
arrangement.p: Descriptions of contents reflect the majority of items in each box. Please note that not all items or subjects in a container may be listed.

controlaccess.subject: Trade regulation--United States.
Budget--United States.
controlaccess.corpname: United States. Office of Management and Budget.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes major policy statements, official reports, notes, and memoranda from speaking engagements.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Material for this file, and all subsequent fiscal year budget material files, includes congressional budget reviews, administration material for government agencies, reports, memoranda, and press material related to the Office of Management and Budget (OMB's) administration or proposed administration of the federal budget for the described fiscal year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains clippings of news and magazine articles either quoting or referring to Miller. Also includes a series of folders titled "The Miller File" with collected notes, memoranda, correspondence, articles, and reports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes and transcripts of statements made by Miller before various congressional committees. Subjects and material relate to both the FTC and the OMB.

did.unittitle: Council on Wage and Price Stability subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes and memoranda.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes, drafts, and related travel material. Subjects relate to both the FTC and the OMB.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains copies of the Congressional Record from 1981-1985.

did.unittitle: "Energy and Science (Fall Director's Review Fiscal Year 1989)" briefing binder,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, drafts, and other material related to the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings (GRH) Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, and the Balanced Budget Emergency Deficit Control Reaffirmation Act of 1987.
See also: Boxes 5, 135.

did.unittitle: "Task Force on Regulatory Relief" briefing binder,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains edited drafts of articles, op-ed pieces, book chapters, and reports written by Miller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes personal and professional correspondence organized by month. Subjects and material relate to both the FTC and the OMB.

did.unittitle: Transcripts of Office of Management and Budget (OMB) confirmation hearing,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes departmental budget briefings, employment statistics, reports, memoranda, and other material for the Director-Designate.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 1986 "Budget Status Report to the President."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes campaign material and surrogate briefing book.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains various proposals submitted to Miller by members of Congress.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes file titled "Budget Ideas" with material related to the federal budget, including budget proposals for defense and trade reform.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, notes, reports, statistics, and briefing material related to the national defense budget.

did.unittitle: Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs (OIRA) subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda and reports.
See also: Box 57

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes file titled "Revenue Options."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains weekly OMB reports with employment, stock, and budget-related statistics. The reports cover almost every week from February 1986 through September 1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes 1984 January-June meeting agenda related to the FTC, in addition to travel files reporting OMB business conducted out of office, 1987-1988.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes various economic journals, along with official FTC and OMB reports.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes files titled "Resources I" and "Resources II" with memoranda, notes, reports, and printed matter related to the OIRA.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes file titled "Budget Testimony" with transcripts of congressional testimony and other material related to the 1989 fiscal year budget. Also includes OMB administrative files.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes material related to management and day-to-day operations at the OMB.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains memos, reports, and printed matter related to the privatization of industry. Includes two photographs of Reagan with Miller and staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes clippings and meeting notes.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, social invitations, personnel files, and correspondence. Also includes an official profile of Miller titled "Jim's biography."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains various reports and briefings related to domestic and foreign policy in the Reagan administration, especially the budget deficit.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes "Briefing Manual for the Director's Office."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include "Postal Service," "Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries Report," and "Department of Justice - Review of Major Litigation."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes "Budget Update for President and Cabinet" budget presentation dated July 1987 (Box 67) and State of the Union subject file (Box 68) with notes and memoranda related to potential budget topics in Reagan's 1987 State of the Union Address.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes reports, memoranda, and travel itineraries. Also includes "State of the Union" subject file for the 1986 State of the Union Address.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes "Drug Bill/ Executive Order" briefing binder.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include: "T-1, T-2, T-3" economic projections, "Overall Budget Advocacy" briefing binder, and "Domestic Advocacy" briefing binder with material related to welfare and economic relief programs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, notes, drafts of written reports, and printed matter related to the OIRA, the President's Task Force on Regulatory Relief, and Reagan's 1981 Executive Order on regulatory relief.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains course syllabi, notes, grades, and lecture materials from an economics course taught by Miller in 1971.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains notes, memoranda, reports, and printed matter related to Miller's tenure with AEI. Also includes a large subject file on "Small Business."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes meeting notes, reports, and correspondence related to the Southern Economic Association in 1981.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes official reports, journals, and telephone directories related to the FTC and the OMB.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes circulated drafts and copies of papers presented at the Hoover Institution Conference on Antitrust Laws and Economic Efficiency in August 1984.

did.unittitle: OIRA issue papers for 1985 Regulatory Program,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains official FTC reports. Titles include "The First Three Years of the Reagan Administration Leadership" and "Advertising Over-the-Counter Antacids."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes "Progress" reports prepared by the FTC, OMB, and the President's Commission on Regulatory Relief.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes files related to "CBO (Congressional Budget Office) Estimates," Reagan's 1987 "Economic Bill of Rights" speech, and the federal deficit ("Capital Budget" file).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes miscellaneous memoranda, notes, internal reports, and printed matter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes economic reports and publications from AEI and the FTC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, notes, internal reports, and printed matter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include "Credit Policy and Management," "Privatization Proposals," "EDGAR Presidential Priority Review System," "Catastrophic Health," and "Reconciliation."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes prints of Miller and staff at various events. Also includes three prints of Miller with Reagan at a White House meeting.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains notes, reports, and memoranda.

did.unittitle: "Administrative Conference of the U.S. Plenary Session" subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains agenda, meetings notes, conference proposals, and other related material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains memoranda, correspondence, notes, and printed matter primarily related to the OMB.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, correspondence, reports, and printed matter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes file containing "Memoranda to the President."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains newspaper and magazine articles related to du Pont's political career.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes four files with OMB and Congressional budget estimates related to the expansion of Medicare and Medicaid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, correspondence, notes, reports, and news articles.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes budget update reports and cabinet presentations for the 1986-1989 fiscal year budgets.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains letters sent and received by Miller as Director of the OMB. Subjects include "Selected Letters" as well as congratulatory notes related to Miller's nomination and his departure from OMB.

did.unittitle: "Vice President's Task Force on Regulatory Relief" subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, reports, correspondence, and related printed matter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, correspondence, drafts of legislation, economic projections, and news articles related to various Congressional bills and budget-related topics. Titles include "Drug Bill," "Farm Bill (1985)," "Proposition 65," and "Drought." Also includes a file with material related to the 1988 GOP Convention.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include "Parental Leave," "Adoption," "Project X" (on Social Security), "Regulatory Relief," and "Privatization" (with material related to a trip to London).

did.unittitle: State of the Union Address subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda and reports related to budget topics in Reagan's 1988 State of the Union Address.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include "Corporate Legislation," "Farm Credit Act (1987)," "New Drug Initiative," "Citizens for America," and "White House Talking Points."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda and reports.

did.unittitle: Metropolitan Statistical Area, Decatur, Alabama subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, correspondence, notes, reports, and printed matter related to the town of Decatur, Alabama's request to be designated a Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Also includes an August 1985 "Presentation to the President."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Titles include "New Farm Bill" and "Homeless."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes notes, speeches, joke list, photographs, and other event material.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes file with "Government Affairs Committee Responses."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, reports, and printed matter related to the Quadrennial Commission on Executive, Legislative, and Judicial Salaries.

did.unittitle: General Motors Baltimore Plant subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, reports and transcripts of testimony related to a standards case between the Maryland Occupational Safety and Health Services and General Motors, in which Miller served as an expert witness.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes copies of official FTC opinions issued for various cases.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes op-eds, articles, interviews, and official FTC statements written by Miller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, transcripts of testimony, and other material related to the Congressional Oversight Committee led by former Michigan representative John Dingell.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes journal articles, op-ed pieces, and transcripts of interviews. Box 144 contains a section of files identified as unpublished writings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains memos, notes, reports, and printed matter presumably related to an FTC investigation involving fire hazards and flammable materials.

did.unittitle: "Administrative Conference of the United States" subject file,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memos, notes, reports, and printed matter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains assorted notes, memoranda, and printed matter from 1978-1981. Subjects include federal regulations, FTC testimony, and personnel restructuring within the federal government.

did.unittitle: "The Performance of the Federal Trade Commission 1977-1984" (report),

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains FTC case opinions written or issued by Chairman Miller.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes Director's memoranda on writing style and writing preferences for OMB staff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes memoranda, notes, correspondence, news articles, and reports collectively identified as the "Miller File."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Contains briefing books prepared for the Chairman on "Alcohol Advertising" and "Takeovers."
